snippet.title: [Early Acess] 流光記憶之灰 Grayscale Memories - Gameplay / (PC)
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1645780/_Grayscale_Memories/
Can a lonely spirit found where it would belong to?
Story-based short 3D game, with simple control and multiple gameplays,
you can experience the story seamlessly while playing games.
After finishing the main storyline, there are some more challenge levels for you to play
